title: Design Thinking-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: An experiential learning environment where in-service professionals solve mathematical problems encountered across diverse industrial settings through a design thinking process.

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to systematically solve real-world industrial math problems following the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test).
Collaboratively derive user-centered innovative solutions and strengthen mathematical modeling competencies.
Conduct an experiential learning cycle by iteratively prototyping and refining solutions through practical experience.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
